metadata.name: A stitch in time saves 9 I
metadata.description:
What does this reflect to you at first glance?  
Ever implemented the title to act?  
What were you told about procrastination?  
"Train up a child in the way he should go, and when he is old, he will not depart from it. 
                                                                                                             ~Proverbs 22:6  
(Inspired by: My mum who states proverbs in her conversations) 

While growing up I have always heard this 'A stitch in time saves 9'.  
Fast forward to photography choosing me, I knew I would love to pass this saying to everyone through art. 
The earlier we embrace our scars, the mistakes and stitch them, the better we become preventing reoccurrence.

Artist: Yahdiogo Ozi Agbo

Collection: A stitch in time saves 9

Edition: 1/1

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no right to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
